column1: guru kriyA kramaH sarva budDa boDisattveByaH namaH
column2: @256b # // rgya gar skad du /gu ru kri ya kra ma / bod skad du / bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: praTamam prAmANikaH AcAryaH Sizye prasAda sampratyaya aBilAza AtmikAm SradDAm janayet
column2: dang por tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis / slob ma la dad pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dod pa'i dad pa bskyed la /

column1: tatas boDi citta anuSaMsAm uktvA utsAham janayet
column2: de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon brjod la spro ba bskyed par bya'o //

column1: tatas param viSizwa vihAre viSizwa pUjA upakaraNam sTApayet
column2: de nas gnas khang khyad par can du mchod pa'i tshogs khyad par can bshams la /

column1: Arya saMGAn Amantrya praNamya pAdO prakzAlya Asanam pradAya
column2: 'phags pa'i tshogs spyan drangs te /

column1: uttara anuttara pUjA upakaraNEH sampUjya pUjA meGa mantrAn api tris uccaret
column2: phyag 'tshal ba dang / zhabs bsil zhing gdan dbul ba dang / bla na yod pa dang / bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis legs par mchod cing / mchod pa'i sprin gyi sngags kyang lan gsum brjod do //

column1: stotA sugata viSizwa guNa smaraNa dvArA sa Adaram stutvA tad tad vRdDi karANi api padAni uccaret
column2: bstod pa byed pas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan khyad par can dran pa'i sgo nas gus pas bstod cing / de dang de 'phel ba'i tshig kyang brjod do //

column1: tatas ca deSanA anum odana aa DyezaNA prArTanA pariNAmana AdayaH karaNIyAH
column2: de nas bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste /

column1: tatas SradDAvAn SizyaH AcArya praNamet
column2: de nas slob ma dad pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag byas la /

column1: aDyezaNa AdiBiH dviviDam boDi cittam samutpAdya tezAm sva svaBAvam Bedam vESizwyaQcA api KyApayet
column2: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis legs par bskyed la / de dag gi rang gi ngo bo dang / dbye ba dang / khyad par yang brjod do //

column1: tatas boDi caryA NAm zaz pAramitAnAm catur saMgraha vastUnAm catura pramANa AdInAm ca lakzaNam hetum Palam SikzA kramam cyuti acyuti doza guNAn yaTAviDi SikzA Adikam api vistareNa nirdiSet
column2: de nas byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / bslab pa'i go rims dang / nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa'i skyon yon dang / tshul ji ltar bslab pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bstan par bya'o //

column1: sA ca apramAdena samprajanyena smRtyA ca grahaNIyA iti Sikzeta
column2: de yang bag yod pa dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pas zin par bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //

column1: tezAm lakzaNam kramam cyuti acyuti doza guNa AdIn api Sikzeta
column2: de dag gi mtshan nyid dang / go rims dang / nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa'i skyon yon la sogs pa yang bslab par @257a * // bya'o //

column1: tad anuzWAnAya api tIvra vIryam utpAdya niDyAna duHKa aDivAsana akzAntim avikzipta samADim
column2: de dag byed pa la yang brtson 'grus drag po bskyed la ji snyam pa dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin med par shes par byas la / bslab pa gsum mam /

column1: prajQA niHsvaBAva tAm ca jQAtvA triSikzAm triviDa prajQAm vA samADAya caryA paTa viDinA Sikzeta iti nirdiSet
column2: shes rab rnam pa gsum la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / spyod lam gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o //

column1: ante praNiDAnena parisamApayet iti api vadet
column2: mthar smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o //

column1: ayam hi AcArya deSanA kriyA kramaH
column2: 'di ni slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i las kyi go rims so //

column1: SizyaH pi yaTAviDiH upadizwaH taTA Sikzeta
column2: slob mas kyang tshul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bslab par bya'o //

column1: ayam tu lAkzaNika mahAyAna citta utpAda SikzA deSanA viDiH kramaH vE OdArika tayA darSitaH
column2: 'di ni mtshan nyid theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang bslab pa bstan pa'i tshul lam go rims che long tsam bstan pa yin no //

column1: vistareNa tu paratas jQAtavyam
column2: rgyas par ni gzhan nas shes par bya'o //
bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa /
